title: Third-party Apple Music app ‘Soor’ comes to iPad with three-column design, Cover Flow, and more
content:
As we’ve highlighted in the past, there are a wide-array of third-party apps available that can enhance the Apple Music experience. One of our favorites here at 9to5Mac is Soor, which is a full-featured third-party client for Apple Music. With a new update rolling out this week, Soor now features a dedicated iPad design for the first time.

more…
